bytesToHex

public static String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)
Create a lowercase hexadecimal String representing a byte array.

Parameters:
bytes - the byte array to be expressed
Returns:
the resulting String, in which each input byte has been turned into two hexadecimal characters.
